name: Pancetta Pesto Pasta
keywords: Pancetta, Pesto, Pasta, Italian, Main Course, Quick, Easy, Savory, Tomato, Garlic, Chili, Smoked Paprika, Chicken Stock, Parmesan, Bacon, Weeknight Dinner, Comfort Food, Simple Recipe, Hearty, Flavorful, Creamy (if sauce is creamy), Spicy, Herbaceous, Classic, Family Meal, Dinner Idea, European Cuisine, Rich, Umami, Basil (if added), One-pan (if applicable)
description: A quick and flavorful Italian-inspired pasta dish featuring crispy pancetta, diced tomatoes, spicy birdseye chilis, garlic, and chunky pesto, tossed with your favorite pasta and finished with Parmesan.

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the pancetta until it crisps up and the fat renders out. Start cooking the pasta.
recipeInstructions.name: Crisp Pancetta

recipeInstructions.text: In the fat, with the pancetta, fry the garlic and chili until crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Crisp Garlic

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomato, pesto, chicken stock powder and paprika. Mix and bring to a simmer and then add your pasta.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix up sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper and serve up with parmesan.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve

notes: Super easy and tasty, if you want to be cheap you could also use streaky bacon, you still need something with high fat content.
Great with shredded fresh basil on top as well.
Flat pancetta is important because it has all the great fat that renders down and can be used for frying.
